name: binding-behaviours
description: Base classes for components that can Bind (as listeners) to various types of events and have all those bindings cleanly/safely unbound, either with an explicit call to Unbind or when the component is destroyed.
author: larrykirschner@gmail.com

scripts.install:test: rm -f *.tgz && npm pack && cd test && npm run clean && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -f *.tgz && cd test && npm run clean
scripts.pub:tag: git add -A && git commit -m ${npm_package_version} && git tag -a ${npm_package_version} -m ${npm_package_version} && git push origin master && git push origin ${npm_package_version}
